events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the product does not match what I purchased.
The system labelled this case under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request for money back after receiving an incorrect item.
Assigning the case to agent Emily R. for handling the refund request related to order discrepancy.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order and I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can verify the details quickly?
I have attached the photos of the product along with the order confirmation number as you requested to assist with verifying my claim.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund for your purchase immediately, and you should see the amount credited to your account within 5-7 business days.
I appreciate your prompt response and the refund solution. This has made the situation much easier to handle, thank you!
The refund has been initiated successfully, and we have closed the case on our end. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
Just following up to confirm you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your resolution.
Since the refund was confirmed received and the customer has no further issues, we are now closing this case.
